item.title: Debugging with the Python Debugger - PDB
item.description: In this tutorial we’ll be having a look at the Python Debugger, what it is and how you can use it to effectively debug your Python applications. Knowing how to debug your code is an incredibly important tool in any programmers arsenal. Thankfully Python comes with the excellent PDB or Python DeBugger which allows us to step through our code and effectively work out what has gone wrong. The official documentation for the Python Debugger can be found here: Python Debugger
